languages.text: Гордость Сантиэля станет миром-некрополем, мрачным и величественным памятником кровавой битвы между ксеносами и Империумом Человечества. Однажды гравитационная хватка пустоты сорвет ее с орбитальной траектории и казнит в холодных объятьях тьмы, но и после этого все будут помнить Гордость Сантиэля.

traits.locale_text: Гордость Сантиэля станет миром-некрополем, мрачным и величественным памятником кровавой битвы между ксеносами и Империумом человечества. Однажды гравитационная хватка Пустоты сорвет ее с орбитальной траектории и казнит в холодных объятьях тьмы, но и после этого все будут помнить Гордость Сантиэля.

languages.text: Santiel's Pride will become a cemetery world, a dark and majestic monument to the bloody battle between the xenos and the Imperium of Man. One day, the gravitational pull of the void will tear the world off orbit and swing the planet into its cold embrace. Even after, everyone will remember Santiel's Pride.
languages.original_text: Гордость Сантиэля станет миром-некрополем, мрачным и величественным памятником кровавой битвы между ксеносами и Империумом Человечества. Однажды гравитационная хватка пустоты сорвет ее с орбитальной траектории и казнит в холодных объятьях тьмы, но и после этого все будут помнить Гордость Сантиэля.

traits.locale_text: Santiel's Pride will become a cemetery world, a dark and majestic monument to the bloody battle between the xenos and the Imperium of Man. One day, the gravitational grip of the void will tear the world off its orbit and swing it in the cold embrace of the darkness, but even after that, everyone will remember Santiel's Pride.

One day, the gravitational grip of the void will tear the world off its orbit and swing it in the cold embrace of the darkness, but even after that, everyone will remember Santiel's Pride.

One day, the gravitational pull of the void will tear the world off orbit and swing the planet into its cold embrace. Even after, everyone will remember Santiel's Pride.

One day, the gravitational pull of the void will tear the world off orbit and swing the planet into its cold embrace. Even after, everyone will remember Santiel's Pride.

Santiel's Pride will become a cemetery world, a dark and majestic monument to the bloody battle between the xenos and the Imperium of Man. One day, the gravitational pull of the void will tear the world off orbit and swing the planet into its cold embrace. Even after, everyone will remember Santiel's Pride.

languages.text: La Gloire de Santiel deviendra un monde cimetière, un monument de ténèbres et de grandeur commémorant la bataille sanglante qui oppose les xénos à l'Imperium de l'Humanité. Un jour, l'emprise gravitationnelle du vide arrachera la planète à son orbite et l'expédiera dans les ténèbres glaciales. Mais même alors, son nom restera dans les mémoires.
languages.original_text: Santiel's Pride will become a cemetery world, a dark and majestic monument to the bloody battle between the xenos and the Imperium of Man. One day, the gravitational pull of the void will tear the world off orbit and swing the planet into its cold embrace. Even after, everyone will remember Santiel's Pride.

traits.locale_text: La Gloire de Santiel deviendra un monde cimetière, un monument de ténèbres et de grandeur commémorant la bataille sanglante qui oppose les xénos à l'Imperium de l'Humanité. Un jour, l'emprise gravitationnelle du vide arrachera la planète à son orbite et l'expédiera dans les ténèbres glaciales. Mais même alors, son nom restera dans les mémoires.

languages.text: 桑提尔之傲将会成为一个墓地世界，一座黑暗而雄伟的纪念碑，纪念人类帝国与异形之间的血腥战斗。终有一天，虚空的引力会将这个世界从星轨上扯走，将它卷入它冰冷的怀抱。但即便在那之后，所有人依旧会铭记桑提尔之傲这个世界。
languages.original_text: Santiel's Pride will become a cemetery world, a dark and majestic monument to the bloody battle between the xenos and the Imperium of Man. One day, the gravitational pull of the void will tear the world off orbit and swing the planet into its cold embrace. Even after, everyone will remember Santiel's Pride.

traits.locale_text: 桑提尔之傲将会成为一个墓地世界，一座黑暗而雄伟的纪念碑，纪念人类帝国与异形之间的血腥战斗。终有一天，虚空的引力会将这个世界从星轨上扯走，将它卷入它冰冷的怀抱。但即便在那之后，所有人依旧会铭记桑提尔之傲这个世界。

languages.text: Santiels Stolz wird zu einer Friedhofswelt. Als dunkles und majestätisches Denkmal erinnert der Planet an die blutige Schlacht zwischen den Xenos und dem Imperium der Menschheit. Eines Tages wird die Anziehungskraft der Leere die Welt aus ihrem Orbit reißen und den Planeten in die kalte Umarmung der Dunkelheit gleiten lassen. Selbst danach aber wird sich jeder an Santiels Stolz erinnern.
languages.original_text: Santiel's Pride will become a cemetery world, a dark and majestic monument to the bloody battle between the xenos and the Imperium of Man. One day, the gravitational pull of the void will tear the world off orbit and swing the planet into its cold embrace. Even after, everyone will remember Santiel's Pride.

traits.locale_text: Santiels Stolz wird zu einer Friedhofswelt. Als dunkles und majestätisches Denkmal erinnert der Planet an die blutige Schlacht zwischen den Xenos und dem Imperium der Menschheit. Eines Tages wird die Anziehungskraft der Leere die Welt aus ihrem Orbit reißen und den Planeten in die kalte Umarmung der Dunkelheit gleiten lassen. Selbst danach aber wird sich jeder an Santiels Stolz erinnern.

languages.text: Orgullo de Santiel se convertirá en un mundo cementerio, actuando como un oscuro e imponente monumento a la sanguinaria batalla entre los xenos y el Imperium de la Humanidad. Un día, la fuerza gravitacional del vacío arrastrará a este mundo fuera de su órbita y acogerá al planeta en su fría morada. Incluso después de eso, Orgullo de Santiel será recordado por todos.
languages.original_text: Santiel's Pride will become a cemetery world, a dark and majestic monument to the bloody battle between the xenos and the Imperium of Man. One day, the gravitational pull of the void will tear the world off orbit and swing the planet into its cold embrace. Even after, everyone will remember Santiel's Pride.

traits.locale_text: Orgullo de Santiel se convertirá en un mundo cementerio, actuando como un oscuro e imponente monumento a la sanguinaria batalla entre los xenos y el Imperium de la Humanidad. Un día, la fuerza gravitacional del vacío arrastrará a este mundo fuera de su órbita y acogerá al planeta en su fría morada. Incluso después de eso, Orgullo de Santiel será recordado por todos.

languages.text: サンティエル・プライドは墓場惑星、そして異種族と人類たる帝国間の、血に濡れた戦いが起きた暗く壮大な記念惑星となる。いつか虚空の引力で惑星は軌道から引き離されて、地上は冷たい抱擁の中で振り回されるだろう。その後は、誰もがサンティエル・プライドの事を思い出すのだ。
languages.original_text: Santiel's Pride will become a cemetery world, a dark and majestic monument to the bloody battle between the xenos and the Imperium of Man. One day, the gravitational pull of the void will tear the world off orbit and swing the planet into its cold embrace. Even after, everyone will remember Santiel's Pride.

languages.text: Santiel'in Gururu bir mezarlık dünya olacak, zenolar ve İnsan İmparatorluğu arasındaki kanlı savaşın karanlık ve görkemli bir anıtı hâline gelecek. Bir gün uçsuzun çekim kuvveti, dünyayı yörüngesinden çıkaracak ve gezegeni o soğuk kucağına çekecek. Bunun sonrasında bile Santiel'in Gururu'nu herkes hatırlayacak.
languages.original_text: Santiel's Pride will become a cemetery world, a dark and majestic monument to the bloody battle between the xenos and the Imperium of Man. One day, the gravitational pull of the void will tear the world off orbit and swing the planet into its cold embrace. Even after, everyone will remember Santiel's Pride.
